display_help: You fight through the pain of combat due to your unrelenting nature, healing damage automatically over time. This heal over time is less powerful when Unrelenting's crash protection effect is activated by use of a power with a crash component.
display_target_help: You fight through the pain of combat due to your unrelenting nature, healing damage automatically over time. This heal over time is less powerful when Unrelenting's crash protection effect is activated by use of a power with a crash component.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You heal {PlayerDest} with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.
